body: The wearer of these gauntlets gains a +2 bonus on one type of combat maneuver check (such as bull rush, disarm, or steal) chosen by the creator when the item is created.
name: Gauntlets of the Skilled Maneuver
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Hands/Hands Slot Wondrous Items/Gauntlets of the Skilled Maneuver
